Slow mail service detected (%1$s) an attempt to perform a mail box list operation on several accounts took an average of %2$s seconds per account
translations.The app.mail.transport setting is not se: The app.mail.transport setting is not set to smtp. This configuration can cause issues with modern email security measures such as SPF and DKIM because emails are sent directly from the web server, which is often not properly configured for this purpose. To address this, we have discontinued support for the mail transport. Please remove app.mail.transport from your configuration to use the SMTP transport and hide this message. A properly configured SMTP setup is required to ensure email delivery.
translations.ðŸ’Œ A mail app for Nextcloud: ðŸ’Œ A mail app for Nextcloud
translations.**ðŸ’Œ A mail app for Nextcloud**\n\n- *:
**ðŸ’Œ A mail app for Nextcloud**

- **ðŸš€ Integration with other Nextcloud apps!** Currently Contacts, Calendar & Files â€“ more to come.
- **ðŸ“¥ Multiple mail accounts!** Personal and company account? No problem, and a nice unified inbox. Connect any IMAP account.
- **ðŸ”’ Send & receive encrypted mails!** Using the great [Mailvelope](https://mailvelope.com) browser extension.
- **ðŸ™ˆ Weâ€™re not reinventing the wheel!** Based on the great [Horde](https://www.horde.org) libraries.
- **ðŸ“¬ Want to host your own mail server?** We do not have to reimplement this as you could set up [Mail-in-a-Box](https://mailinabox.email)!

## Ethical AI Rating

### Priority Inbox

Positive:
* The software for training and inferencing of this model is open source.
* The model is created and trained on-premises based on the user's own data.
* The training data is accessible to the user, making it possible to check or correct for bias or optimise the performance and CO2 usage.

### Thread Summaries (opt-in)

**Rating:** ðŸŸ¢/ðŸŸ¡/ðŸŸ /ðŸ”´

The rating depends on the installed text processing backend. See [the rating overview](https://docs.nextcloud.com/server/latest/admin_manual/ai/index.html) for details.

Learn more about the Nextcloud Ethical AI Rating [in our blog](https://nextcloud.com/blog/nextcloud-ethical-ai-rating/).

translations.Automated reply to incoming messages. If: Automated reply to incoming messages. If someone sends you several messages, this automated reply will be sent at most once every 4 days.
translations.The autoresponder uses Sieve, a scriptin: The autoresponder uses Sieve, a scripting language supported by many email providers. If you're unsure whether yours does, check with your provider. If Sieve is available, click the button to go to the settings and enable it.

translations.Highlight external email addresses by en: Highlight external email addresses by enabling this feature, manage your internal addresses and domains to ensure recognised contacts stay unmarked.

translations.Indexing your messages. This can take a: Indexing your messages. This can take a bit longer for larger folders.
translations.Messages will automatically be marked as: Messages will automatically be marked as important based on which messages you interacted with or marked as important. In the beginning you might have to manually change the importance to teach the system, but it will improve over time.
translations.Messages sent by you that require a repl: Messages sent by you that require a reply but did not receive one after a couple of days will be shown here.

translations.Sieve is a powerful language for writing: Sieve is a powerful language for writing filters for your mailbox. You can manage the sieve scripts in Mail if your email service supports it. Sieve is also required to use Autoresponder and Filters.

translations.This message contains a verified digital: This message contains a verified digital S/MIME signature. The message hasn't been changed since it was sent.
translations.This message contains an unverified digi: This message contains an unverified digital S/MIME signature. The message might have been changed since it was sent or the certificate of the signer is untrusted.

translations.Disable trash retention by leaving the f: Disable trash retention by leaving the field empty or setting it to 0. Only mails deleted after enabling trash retention will be processed.
No senders are trusted at the moment.
translations.Choose the headers you want to use to cr: Choose the headers you want to use to create your filter. In the next step, you will be able to refine the filter conditions and specify the actions to be taken on messages that match your criteria.
translations.Are you sure to delete the mail filter?: Are you sure to delete the mail filter?
translations.Take control of your email chaos. Filter: Take control of your email chaos. Filters help you to prioritize what matters and eliminate clutter.
translations.Hang tight while the filters load: Hang tight while the filters load
translations.If all the conditions are met, the actio: If all the conditions are met, the actions will be performed
translations.If any of the conditions are met, the ac: If any of the conditions are met, the actions will be performed
translations.A substring match. The field matches if: A substring match. The field matches if the provided value is contained within it. For example, "report" would match "port".
translations.A pattern match using wildcards. The \"*: A pattern match using wildcards. The "*" symbol represents any number of characters (including none), while "?" represents exactly one character. For example, "*report*" would match "Business report 2024".
translations.Failed to update step in quick action: Failed to update step in quick action
translations.Failed to add steps to quick action: Failed to add steps to quick action
translations.There was an error when provisioning acc: There was an error when provisioning accounts.
translations.Successfully deleted and deprovisioned a: Successfully deleted and deprovisioned accounts for "{domain}"
translations.Error when deleting and deprovisioning a: Error when deleting and deprovisioning accounts for "{domain}"
translations.Could not save default classification se: Could not save default classification setting
translations.The mail app allows users to read mails: The mail app allows users to read mails on their IMAP accounts.
translations.Here you can find instance-wide settings: Here you can find instance-wide settings. User specific settings are found in the app itself (bottom-left corner).
translations.A provisioning configuration will provis: A provisioning configuration will provision all accounts with a matching email address.
translations.Using the wildcard (*) in the provisioni: Using the wildcard (*) in the provisioning domain field will create a configuration that applies to all users, provided they do not match another configuration.
translations.The provisioning mechanism will prioriti: The provisioning mechanism will prioritise specific domain configurations over the wildcard domain configuration.
translations.Should a new matching configuration be f: Should a new matching configuration be found after the user was already provisioned with another configuration, the new configuration will take precedence and the user will be reprovisioned with the configuration.
translations.There can only be one configuration per: There can only be one configuration per domain and only one wildcard domain configuration.
translations.These settings can be used in conjunctio: These settings can be used in conjunction with each other.
translations.If you only want to provision one domain: If you only want to provision one domain for all users, use the wildcard (*).
translations.This setting only makes most sense if yo: This setting only makes most sense if you use the same user back-end for your Nextcloud and mail server of your organisation.
translations.Allow additional Mail accounts from User: Allow additional Mail accounts from User Settings
translations.The Mail app can process user data with: The Mail app can process user data with the help of the configured large language model and provide assistance features like thread summaries, smart replies and event agendas.
translations.Enable classification by importance by d: Enable classification by importance by default
translations.The Mail app can classify incoming email: The Mail app can classify incoming emails by importance using machine learning. This feature is enabled by default but can be disabled by default here. Individual users will still be able to toggle the feature for their accounts.
translations.Enable classification of important mails: Enable classification of important mails by default
translations.You can set up an anti spam service emai: You can set up an anti spam service email address here.
translations.Any email that is marked as spam will be: Any email that is marked as spam will be sent to the anti spam service.
translations.Gmail allows users to access their email: Gmail allows users to access their email via IMAP. For security reasons this access is only possible with an OAuth 2.0 connection or Google accounts that use two-factor authentication and app passwords.
translations.You have to register a new Client ID for: You have to register a new Client ID for a "Web application" in the Google Cloud console. Add the URL {url} as authorized redirect URI.
translations.Microsoft requires you to access your em: Microsoft requires you to access your emails via IMAP using OAuth 2.0 authentication. To do this, you need to register an app with Microsoft Entra ID, formerly known as Microsoft Azure Active Directory.
translations.For more details, please click here to o: For more details, please click here to open our documentation.
translations.These settings are used to pre-configure: These settings are used to pre-configure the user interface preferences they can be overridden by the user in the mail settings
translations.Successfully set up anti spam email addr: Successfully set up anti spam email addresses
translations.Error saving anti spam email addresses: Error saving anti spam email addresses
translations.Successfully deleted anti spam reporting: Successfully deleted anti spam reporting email
translations.Error deleting anti spam reporting email: Error deleting anti spam reporting email
translations.Add the email address of your anti spam: Add the email address of your anti spam report service here.
translations.When using this setting, a report email: When using this setting, a report email will be sent to the SPAM report server when a user clicks "Mark as spam".
translations.The original message will be attached as: The original message will be attached as a "message/rfc822" attachment.
translations.The LDAP aliases integration reads an at: The LDAP aliases integration reads an attribute from the configured LDAP directory to provision email aliases.
translations.A multi value attribute to provision ema: A multi value attribute to provision email aliases. For each value an alias is created. Aliases existing in Nextcloud which are not in the LDAP directory are deleted.
translations.* %USERID% and %EMAIL% will be replaced: * %USERID% and %EMAIL% will be replaced with the user's UID and email
translations.With the settings above, the app will cr: With the settings above, the app will create account settings in the following way:
translations.The provided PKCS #12 certificate must c: The provided PKCS #12 certificate must contain at least one certificate and exactly one private key.
translations.Failed to import the certificate. Please: Failed to import the certificate. Please check the password.
Failed to import the certificate. Please make sure that the private key matches the certificate and is not protected by a passphrase.
translations.The private key is only required if you: The private key is only required if you intend to send signed and encrypted emails using this certificate.
translations.Failed to share text block with {sharee}: Failed to share text block with {sharee}

translations.Could not load the desired message: Could not load the desired message
translations.Click here if you are not automatically: Click here if you are not automatically redirected within the next few seconds.
translations.If you do not want to visit that page, y: If you do not want to visit that page, you can return to Mail.
translations.Search in the body of messages in priori: Search in the body of messages in priority Inbox
translations.Put my text to the bottom of a reply ins: Put my text to the bottom of a reply instead of on top of it.
translations.Register as application for mail links: Register as application for mail links
translations.Allow the app to collect data about your: Allow the app to collect data about your interactions. Based on this data, the app will adapt to your preferences. The data will only be stored locally.
translations.Mailvelope is a browser extension that e: Mailvelope is a browser extension that enables easy OpenPGP encryption and decryption for emails.
